inclusion.criterion: mandibular molars diagnosed clinically as necrotic with normal apical tissues
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: positive patient's acceptance for participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients able to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal periapical tissues on the radiograph
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: having severe pain and/or acute apical abscesses
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients using antibiotics or analgesic 12 hours before the procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: having multiple teeth that required treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: with non-restorable and/or periodontally compromised teeth
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe pain and acute apical abscesses, which are likely triggers for exclusion.
